modified_SQL_query: SELECT ADD(ADD(ADD(ADD(PLN.PLN_CNT, RTD.RTD_CNT), ACD.ACD_CNT), FOP.FOP_CNT), GAP.GAP_CNT) FROM (subquery_1) AS PLN JOIN (subquery_2) AS RTD ON EQ(1, 1) JOIN (subquery_3) AS ACD ON EQ(1, 1) JOIN (subquery_4) AS FOP ON EQ(1, 1) JOIN (subquery_5) AS GAP ON EQ(1, 1)

subquery_dictionary.subquery_1: SELECT COUNT(*) AS PLN_CNT FROM staging.PlanningDimentsions
subquery_dictionary.subquery_2: SELECT COUNT(*) AS RTD_CNT FROM staging.Run_Time_Description
subquery_dictionary.subquery_3: SELECT COUNT(*) AS ACD_CNT FROM staging.Account_Dimension
subquery_dictionary.subquery_4: SELECT COUNT(*) AS FOP_CNT FROM staging.Forecast_Periods
subquery_dictionary.subquery_5: SELECT COUNT(*) AS GAP_CNT FROM staging.GAP
